body_text: I probably haven't thought this through enough, but I thought that if heartbeat, which constructs the event emitter, clones it into the sandbox (and we throw away the original non-cloned reference, storing only the cloned version as this.eventEmitter) the instance that we call emit on has access to the object?
body: I probably haven't thought this through enough, but I thought that if heartbeat, which constructs the event emitter, clones it into the sandbox (and we throw away the original non-cloned reference, storing only the cloned version as `this.eventEmitter`) the instance that we call `emit` on has access to the object?
body_html: I probably haven't thought this through enough, but I thought that if heartbeat, which constructs the event emitter, clones it into the sandbox (and we throw away the original non-cloned reference, storing only the cloned version as this.eventEmitter) the instance that we call emit on has access to the object?
